author: parithosh
content:
You could probably add logic like:
```
prysm_container_supernode_args: "--subscribe-all-subnets"
prysm_container_command_extra_args: >-
  {{ prysm_container_command_extra_simple_args + prysm_container_command_extra_bootnode_args  + (prysm_container_supernode_args if prysm_is_supernode else []}}
```
then if you setup a variable called prysm_is_supernode in terraform (and similar for the rest), the whole thing should just work without having to rely on hostvars (which we often forget to touch)
